snippet.title: Pylon: Rogue - Early Access Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Soon - Pylon.  New and re-imagined from the ground up.  A single-player, fantasy-based action roguelike/lite.

Available now on Steam Early Access - http://store.steampowered.com/app/386100/
